text: lutvinre janata addehattinreyatuttekk otiyatuttu. neratte tanne avar nicavrttikal ceyyunnavarayirunnu. lutv parannu: "enre janame, ita enre penkuttikal. ivaran ninnalkk kututal visud'dhiyullavar. atinal ninnal allahuve suksikkuka. enre atithikalute karyattil enne manakketilakkatirikkuka. ninnalil vivekamulla oralumille?”
